It's a new HW for an existing project (https://github.com/dalathegreat/Battery-Emulator) that makes the system much more reliable.

I found several issues with unstable connectivity using Arduino cables and the Lilygo board. Here is v1.1 with fixed relay bug and added second CAN.
![v1.1 design](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/4325054/333816892-59685eb1-4e85-4a06-8430-f5ec9b7b1b4b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..lrtqdROnGU5RA9Y1KNkkVYBZg1GUm71PDhHcXVH9HDM)
